title: 找一个血量插件
author: 3357dou
txt_content:
找一个血量显示插件
要显示在怪物头顶上





UZH4([SJ}EK~M1)I%3Z(MQ3.png

replies.author: wocaishi
replies.txt_content: 血量显示HealthBar.jar插件希望能解决，如果要插件回复我

replies.author: 阿威23333
replies.txt_content: mcMMO吧，那个可以显示还可以配合大多数插件的使用

replies.author: penjing
replies.txt_content: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/combatindicator.5834/ 这个可以 还可以显示全息伤害
